about_the_game:
Welcome to Installation Prometheus-3:


Built on the distant frozen third moon of Jupiter, Europa, site prometheus-3 houses the greatest minds of our age working together to protect humanity from a hidden world of terrifying anomalous creatures and objects that could destroy even reality itself. You are Doctor Logan Andresen, an employee of the SCP Foundation, sent to this site to help with the research and containment of these threats labelled as 'SCPs'.

Survive the insanity:


Despite their best defences, the site has been infiltrated. Multiple mysterious organizations are working together in an urgent coordinated attack, warning of the danger of what would happen if they did not take action... The creatures you once tried to contain are now free, you must learn their weaknesses to survive. There is no way to fight back, if stealth fails, be prepared to run.

Follow the story:


Work with your colleagues and other survivors to make your way through the site. Follow a main quest line and uncover the mystery behind the disaster. Explore the site and complete side quests to earn upgrades and items that could make the difference between surviving the horrors or not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 9700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Set in the universe of the SCP foundation, play as Doctor Logan Andersen as you fight to survive a catastrophic containment breach releasing dangerous entities and objects beyond scientific explanation.
